stxxl::stream::iterator2stream< InputIterator_ > Class Template Reference
[Stream package]

A model of steam that outputs data from an input iterator For convinience use streamify function instead of direct instantiation of iterator2stream . More...

Detailed Description

template<class InputIterator_>
class stxxl::stream::iterator2stream< InputIterator_ >

A model of steam that outputs data from an input iterator For convinience use streamify function instead of direct instantiation of iterator2stream .
